dmca.title: Breach of World Guides Copyright
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: World Guides [mailto:info@world-guides.com] 
Posted At: Friday, October 20, 2006 2:23 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Breach of World Guides Copyright
Subject: Breach of World Guides Copyright


Dear Webmaster,

It has come to our attention that you have copied the original content from our
World Guide to Paris  -

http://www.paris.world-guides.com

on your page:

http://www.stictravel.com/packages/outbound/gaieparis.asp

The offending material reads as follows:

Paris, France is one of the most fascinating cities in Europe, and tourists to this
wonderful city will find that things to see and do are almost limitless. Known as
the 'City of Light', the beauty of Paris is overwhelming and architectural and
artistic heritage combine to make any visit an unforgettable experience. There are
several tourism and tourist information offices to be found in the city centre of
Paris providing current information about Paris tourist attractions, museums,
events, Paris festivals, Paris travel, Paris sightseeing and general Paris tourism
and tourist information.The city of Paris offers a wide selection of restaurants
serving mouth- watering French food as well as a choice of international cuisine,
and Paris nightlife provides a wealth of entertainment options.  
Disneyland Paris, Parc Ast
